definition: to be prompted by a sudden impulse/carried away by a whim/to have a brainstorm

sentences.english: Thev artist does all the active work, makes the biggest emotional investment.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家独揽了所有的创造性工作，投入了大量的心血。

sentences.english: The results are published in the journal Cardiovascular Ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果公布在心血管超声波期刊上。

sentences.english: Cardiac catheterization with angiography is the reference standard for diagnosing CAD.
sentences.chinese: 心血管导管造影是诊断冠心病的金标准。

sentences.english: You know that how much strenuous effortses have to bartender spend to create the coffee of Ireland?
sentences.chinese: 你知道酒保得花多少心血来创造爱尔兰咖啡吗？

sentences.english: Abstract The cardioprotective effects of estrogen are mediated by receptors expressed in vascular cells.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素心血管效应是由心血管细胞表达的受体介导的。

sentences.english: Abstract The cardioprotective effects of estrogen are mediated by receptors expressed in vascular cells.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素心血管效应是由心血管细胞表达的受体介导的。

sentences.english: Gardening takes more bother than it's worth.
sentences.chinese: 种那些花草要花费很多的心血，不值得。

sentences.english: They went to  great expense to educate their son.
sentences.chinese: 他们为教育孩子花费了大量钱财和心血。

sentences.english: Clinical study of the preventional effect of esmolol on cardiovascular stress induced by tracheal extubation.
sentences.chinese: 艾司洛尔预防气管拔管时心血管反应的临床观察。

sentences.english: Clothing has always been subject to change based on the dictates of fashion and whims.
sentences.chinese: 衣着往往随着时尚潮流的趋势和心血来潮而发生变化。

sentences.english: Valvar stenosis is most frequently associated with a bicuspid valve or other cardiovascular malformation.
sentences.chinese: 瓣膜狭窄多为二瓣叶畸形且常合并其他心血管畸形。

sentences.english: The TEDA International Hospital will be a modern hospital specializing cardiovascular diseases.
sentences.chinese: 泰达国际医院将成为现代化的心血管专科医院。

sentences.english: You poured your hearts into this campaign.
sentences.chinese: 你们在竞选中倾入心血。

sentences.english: It also has betaine to support normal liver function and cardiovascular health.
sentences.chinese: 它还拥有支持甜菜碱肝功能正常和心血管健康。

sentences.english: Your efforts will go to waste if you give it up.
sentences.chinese: 你要是放弃，心血就会白费。

sentences.english: His failure made a mockery of his friend's great efforts to help him.
sentences.chinese: 他的失败使他的朋友帮助他的一番心血白费了。

definition: lit. to spit out one's heart and spill blood (idiom)/to work one's heart out/blood, sweat and tears
painstaking effort/to take a lot of trouble/laborious at pains
to do all one can/to give all one has
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
exhausting/hard/tough/arduous/to work hard/to go to a lot of trouble/hardship(s)
